nodes.text: Kootaa was a male Kubaz who worked as a salesman in the Anoat sector during the Galactic Civil War. Half con artist and half brilliant diplomat, he passionately advocated for equal rights for all species, and defended the superiority of Kubaz cuisine. He also believed that the defunct Jedi Order had never existed in the first place, but was a fabrication made by the Galactic Empire as an excuse for extra security measures.
Several months into the Imperial blockade of the Anoat sector, the Kubaz joined the crew of a young smuggler from Burnin Konn, assisting them on various missions throughout the sector.
